name: NAnt TeamCity Logger
body:
### What is this?
This is a logger that you can use with NAnt so that [TeamCity](http://www.jetbrains.com/teamcity/) will properly display log messages from NAnt.

### Installation
Download the latest version from [our SourceForge site](https://sourceforge.net/projects/nant-tc-log/files/).

Extract the file `Boinst.NAntExtensions.TeamCity.dll` from the archive and copy it into the `extensions\common\4.0` subdirectory of your NAnt installation.

### Invokation
Launch NAnt with the following syntax:

`NAnt.exe -logger:Boinst.NAntExtensions.TeamCity.TeamCityLogger`

### See Also
* [NAnt documentation on Loggers](http://nant.sourceforge.net/release/0.91/help/fundamentals/listeners.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
